meta.title: Our Year Wrapped
meta.subtitle: A year full of care, love and admiration for each other

overview.headline: We need a hobby bruh!!
overview.subtext: Almost 269,000 messages across a year of showing up.

timeline.headline: WEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
timeline.highlight: 307 days of yapping in a row

time_of_day.headline: Sleep schedule got FUCKEDDDD
time_of_day.subtext: We mostly spoke at night (Romantic Styles)

conversation_habits.headline: I reached out more. You were already there.

conversation_style.headline: You always made me feel wanted and admired
conversation_style.interpretation: I asked questions because you made answers worth giving.

language_style.headline: We both had your own language.
language_style.caption: Our most used words (apart from lovey dovey stuff and sex)

daily_rhythm.headline: Who woke up earlier.
daily_rhythm.interpretation: I woke up earlier. I slept earlier too lmao. You were always there waiting for me

inside_joke.headline: Someone apologizes more than necessary.
inside_joke.interpretation: It’s me. I'm sooo losing that bet.

love_language.headline: Who said I Love you more
love_language.interpretation: I did because I LOVE YOU MOREEEEE.

example.summary: I went quiet. You stayed. Thanks for always being there for me.

uplift.headline: Times when you changed my mood through your words
uplift.caption: It happened more than 2,700 times.

closing.headline: This year wasn’t measured in days.
closing.final_line: It was measured in showing up.
closing.signature: I love you so muchhh baby. THIS TOOK ME WAY TOO FUCKING LONG
